org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.spdy

Class SpdyFrameCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.netty.handler.codec.spdy.SpdyFrameCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelDownstreamHandler, ChannelHandler, ChannelUpstreamHandler

    public class SpdyFrameCodec
extends Object
implements ChannelUpstreamHandler, ChannelDownstreamHandler
    A combination of SpdyFrameDecoder and SpdyFrameEncoder.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.jboss.netty.channel.ChannelHandler

        ChannelHandler.Sharable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpdyFrameCodec(int version)
      Creates a new instance with the specified version and the default decoder and encoder options (maxChunkSize (8192), maxHeaderSize (16384), compressionLevel (6), windowBits (15), and memLevel (8)).
      SpdyFrameCodec(int version, int maxChunkSize, int maxHeaderSize, int compressionLevel, int windowBits, int memLevel)
      Creates a new instance with the specified decoder and encoder options.
